title: The new client is acting very weird...your game is broken
body: So...my game is lagging, even though my ping and fps are very good...also, it takes forever to log in, sometimes I cant see friends in chat list, or see their invites, or even join their teams...why is it acting like this, suppose I should reinstall, but  I want your oppion first

replies.body: It would be a waste of time to reinstall the game, I'm telling you from experience. I'm having the same issue for days now

prbably will be for more days, weeks. Resolution to my ticket after changing every possible setting on my pc:

Thank you for the logs you have provided.

Wish I had better news, but it looks like your connection to our servers is passing through a bad node that's outside of your ISP's network, there's nothing we can do from your side, but we're going to use the info you've provided to investigate further and resolve the issue.

I can't provide an estimate for how long this will take but it's our top priority at this point in time. Please let us know if you have any other questions regarding anything else.

Have a good day!
i also tried playing over vpn and look wit log reader. there was around 16%packet lost but issue was same. almost no difference.

If you're seeing weird things like sliding champions or delays in your clicks, but your fps and ping are pretty decent, you may actually be experiencing packet loss. That basically means that some of the data coming from your network is getting damaged somehow before it hits our servers. Let's test for that really quickly using this [**log reader**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743) to be sure. Hit me back up and let me know what it says with a screenshot!

ok here is my printscreem of log reader. i try many times , also try restart modem, close all programs...same issiue. lag in client, huge lags when acepting game. sliding freezing ingame. its barley playable. its happening for almost a week. sometimes is better sometimes is totaly fukedup.

Are you getting disconnected repeatedly in every match? I have only tried arams since I cant verify my game is working properly yet
same thing here. its killing me. fix it
